The setup of this example case is consistent with that in the paper "Large eddy simulation of
starting and developed particle-laden jets" by Dr. Ruoqian Wang. More detailed information of the
case is available at the link below:

https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Ruo-Qian_Wang/publication/260975685_Large_Eddy_Simulation_of_Starting_and_Developed_Particle-Laden_Jets/links/00463532c5e07a4219000000.pdf
